website_summaries.verdict: A great cruising speed of 15 miles per hour, an easy-to-fold compact mode, and the ability to ride it right out of the box come together to make this foldable electric bike worth your consideration.
pros: Max range of 15 miles on a single charge
Maximum speed of 15 miles per hour
cons: Weighing in at 37 pounds, this foldable electric bike may be a little heavy for some users

customer_reviews.title: Pedaling is almost impossible without the battery.
customer_reviews.text: Be warned - if the battery dies, you are screwed! This thing might look like a bicycle, but it's a scooter. The pedals are primarily for hill assistance. It's almost impossible to pedal unless you're on a flat surface, and even then it takes quite a bit of effort to get it going.It has a fixed chain, so no changing gears. It's great for what it is. It rides well and I'm very happy with it overall, but not being able to use it if the battery dies is a big design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nettermann

customer_reviews.title: This bike is not as advertised. In the first ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike is not as advertised. In the first place it's not aluminum. A few of the parts are but a large percentage of them are steel. It's advertised as lightweight, and it's rather heavy. Second, the description says you can either use the electric power or pedal. In fact if you try to pedal, the electric power kicks in. Maybe I just got a lemon, but for $500 I expect all of them to work properly. I don't have an alternate to suggest, but if you choose this one be sure it's on Prime. BTW, folding it is very challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brown

customer_reviews.title: Battery not user replaceable, battery and won’t hold a charge!
customer_reviews.text: revised review after 6 months ownership. DO NOT BUY!!!! The range is now an iffy 2 miles and it is a pain in the ass for this 58 year old body to pedal after it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Okey dokey

customer_reviews.title: Unfold and off you go!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second e-bike and is really an excellent bang for your buck. It is lightweight, easily foldable, and cruises ay a modest 15mph. The pedal assist is jumpy. No issues pedaling when electric is turned off. Smooth riding and comfortable seat. Takes some getting used to but great fun! Sturdy too. It is quite the conversation piece. This comes mostly assembled and partially charged. We added LED lights to front and back as it does not come with.
customer_reviews.author: misscrusty

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy workmanship - don't buy Swagtron
customer_reviews.text: First bike came and had a flat tire. Amazon customer service is amazing so sent a replacement. Second one came and is missing a brake pad so one of the brakes doesn't work. Shoddy craftmanship. Dont go with swagtron. Bf also had the electric scooter, same brand. He had to jump off going a little fast due to a bicycle slamming its brakes on in front of him. Thing smashed to smithereens (more than it should have) and swagtron refused to help despite the warranty purchase. Do not buy Swagtron. Bike is also pretty heavy when folded and carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne S

customer_reviews.title: Peddle assist is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but the peddle assist has too much kick, you can’t really peddle. It’s only useful up the steep hill, where you peddle can really help. . So just use the throttle.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Battery didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: They only reason I give this bike 1 star is because the battery didn’t work and I needed it for comute. It came nicely boxed and very compact which is nice, but when I put it to charge for some reason it didn’t charge at all , must of been some electrical problems...so I just had to send I back. Overall I like the design of the bicycle and how it folds,it’s perfect for city gals like me, that’s why I got it this time from Walmart (it was the same price) and it works perfectly and hopefully it gonna last me a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana vasilarop

customer_reviews.title: 💖💖💖It makes me smile all day long
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday. My first riding experience was awesome!!! Very quiet and smooth and the speed is perfect for riding in the city! The design is my favorite part: simple, clean, elegant yet comfortable. Minimalist’s heaven! It’s also easy to carry when needed. I took it on the subway and it fits a corner perfectly (unlike normal bicycle you can’t bring it in without saying a million of “excuse me” or “sorry” to people around you). Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Never over exert your motor and pedal assist will prolong your range and motor life
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bike with betterchoice and as always the bike came very well protected and in perfect working order shipment was super fast and even though the bike is light in weight is very well made and the saddle is very cumfy i`d buy from this seller again highly reckomend thanks keep up the good work
customer_reviews.author: jason b

customer_reviews.title: Very unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe how easy it is to crash on this. I have excellent balance and this was bike seems to jerk and I instantly go flying off! Dangerous and wish I hadn’t of purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is the third product I've ordered from swagtron. All 3 times the tires go flat after 1 ride. I don't know what the deal is but I need these products to get to work and they have not been reliable.
customer_reviews.author: John Purificato

customer_reviews.title: Utter trash and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got was pretty cool. Worked for about a week. Then one day after folding it up.. the accelerator stopped working. Would charge and etc; but no juice. Contacted Amazon and they sent me a new one. Second one shows up with the air valve snapped. Can't replace again. Contacted "SWAGtron". Representative was a totally acerbic individual. Told me the only way to repair any tire was to send it to them (you have to disassemble the whole electronic hookup to take the tire off, very counter-intuitive). 3/4 weeks. Don't waste your time or money. Buy something where the price matches. Not this junk. The name should warn.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherPersona

customer_reviews.title: Great bike when it works
customer_reviews.text: All around perfect for commuting and such.. However, If you ever get something as simple as a flat, things get really complicated. You have to return the whole bike. They can ship the part for you to replace but it isn't recommended that you replace it yourself because it's just THAT complicated to replace, it isn't a typical bike as it involves electric wires and stuff. If you are into being a mechanic or have spare money for buying a box and paying for shipping if something goes wrong, this is for you. I now have to spend money to buy a large enough box to ship this back
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 and the other 3 are working just fine however 1 stopped charging after owning it for a month. Swagtron is willing to fix it but I have to pay to ship it back which I’m sure will cost an arm and a leg. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L

customer_reviews.title: MY Swagcycle
customer_reviews.text: The bike came earlier than expected, how great was that! Assembly was very easy and it was up and ready to ride in about 10 minutes. The bike took no time to get used to and I'm riding it 3 times a week to my gym. I live in Brooklyn< NY where it's very difficult a car, so I use the bike for local errands. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: jack nayer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike but can't pump the rear tire
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bike. It's easy, convenient and fun. But I ran into problems when my wheels needed to be pumped. The front one is perfectly fine to pump, but the back one is impossible. There is simply no space to be able to connect anything to it. I asked for help and they sent me a valve extender, but it's impossible to put this on too. I've been told to send in the unit but I'm going to try to send the wheel instead. I previously gave it a high rating, but for the price I'm paying, this simple thing isn't supposed to be impossible
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got stranded
customer_reviews.text: I took the bike on a two mile ride and the charge was full, then all of a sudden it stopped. All the green lights were on showing the battery was charged when it died. Too hard to pedal so had to walk it home. Luckily I was not too far. Can't trust it won't happen again so I sent it back. So disappointed in it had high hopes for lots of adventures. Company wanted me to pay for shipping since I bought it through Amazon. Sorry but don't recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kuzmunich

customer_reviews.title: Decent speed, nice design, requires specific parts for repair (massive downside).
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bike for around a month and until just now there were no problems. My commute to work is 9 miles, perfect for this, what's not perfect is the flat that occured. The back tire went flat and I have no way of repairing it myself without voiding any manufacturer help I may receive. Great for casual rides, very unreliable as a ride to where you need to go, especially regarding repairs. Would not recommend for those needing a reliable way to point A to point B. I will be returning this and finding an EBike that won't be as inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great bike  after almost one year howev
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I didn't take the not so good reviews I read about the bike to heart fooling my mind not to purchase it. . This bike is super fun to ride plus it's made in USA. I live in Boston and enjoy zipping through the city GETTING from.point A to B quickly without having to pay for a T card let alone car insurance ant........I really do love it really and Not just because it was only 500 bucks but because it's a quality build. I've been riding it for a few months shy of a year and I ride ita
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Electric bike power to work
customer_reviews.text: 1st bike, power motor never engaged. Replacement bike, ran for several days then sporadically, then motor stopped engaging also. Really liked compact design and quality. But, main purpose in buying bike was to take longer rides with confidence I would be able to return with minimum or no effort. Bike fail to meet my goal!
customer_reviews.author: COB

customer_reviews.title: After one year of use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this electric bicycle for about a year. I use it every day. The battery life is still very healthy. It is very suitable for use in the city. The advantage is that it is light and portable. I can lift it up with one hand. The pedals are only used on slopes. The quality of the bike is very good. I only changed the inner tube once. I did it myself. The inner tube cost about ten dollars. I hope this company can launch a battery with a larger capacity so that I can go farther. When a new version is available, I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: shouriman

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, fantastic battery I rode it all day and it’s still full after charging overnight. It’s an odd but enjoyable ride. It’s part bike part e bike. If you are going up a hill it’s way easier because the bike helps you but you can’t expect it to pull you up the hill by itself. It’s fantastic for flat land, downhill, grass, dirt. Just have to use it as a regular bike up a hill. Either way very impressed with the quality and the ease of use
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy_jas

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Great commute machine.
customer_reviews.text: I reach speeds from fourteen to fifteen MPH. Which is the slowest an e bike should go at. Battery life is good. Although if not fully charged you’ll start to notice it goes slower which I think it’s a normal thing. I’ve ride it under the rain and I’ve had no issues even though it doesn’t say anything about being water resistant. Be aware, once the battery runs out you can still pedal but it’ll take a toll on your legs pretty fast. I’m still deciding wether to keep it or move on to something faster and water resistant. Overall it’s a great bike for the price no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Suc

customer_reviews.title: Good Electric Bike!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this bike for a little over four months now and rode it maybe 20 times and charging it more frequently now. When new get 15 miles charging now getting 8 or 9 miles out of it but it is a good sturdy bike and have had no problems with it and I did expect a drop in miles over time so I think it's a good bike for the money and it's fun to ride just know your mileage is going to drop pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to commute from work and school because it was just close enough to be a short car ride but far enough to be a hellish walk. So far it has gotten me there faster than I expected and even holds up nicely on my city’s poor uneven sidewalks. I would suggest this for people who might not be able to drive to and from work or school and have issues getting places that are just a smidge too far for reasonable walking.
customer_reviews.author: flower

customer_reviews.title: Low quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike around 10 month ago - it drives well and easy to fold but it broke once after 5 months and had to send it back. Now it's the second time it was different issue so I got tired of this bike and so I send it back again and for now it's been there for the past month and a half almost. I'm very sad that it takes so much time to preferably exchange it with a new one because probably something is defective with this product. I would not this product even though it's not that expensive, but it's still 500$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price! Get it
customer_reviews.text: This bike is so awesome, I have the Swagtron pro and it doesn't climb hills well at all. This little gem climbs them at ease. The battery life is incredible if you peddle a bit. I like to peddle a little for exercise. I can't stress what a buy this bike is, it's a fantastic value. It has high quality build and is still fairly light, I have no trouble carrying it upstairs to my room. I absolutely love this purchase, I really can't stress how awesome this bike is. I feel I wasted over $400 on the Swagtron pro, I should have bought this as my first ebike. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: timenim

customer_reviews.title: Love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This might just be my best purchase of the year. I loved my experience with this bicycle. I rode it a long way, but I kept my legs pumping the entire time so it was power-assisted, and I wasn't even tired afterwards. I did replace the seat, on the recommendation of a previous reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Rear tire blew after 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: So the Bike arrived and the box came with a hole in it and the rear wheel nut was eating away at the cardboard. It’s been grinded but still useable . I charged the bike and check everything and the front tire needed air . No problem. After riding it for 30 minutes the back tire made a popping sound. I’ve never ridden a bike and had the inner tube break like this bike did. After spending $500 I feel maybe I should have just went to target or Walmart and for a $100 bike that probably would have lasted a lot longer than this item . How do I contact the seller ?
customer_reviews.author: LeoCMunk

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great E-Bike
customer_reviews.text: I have had my bike for about a week now and have enjoyed every minute of it. -Battery life is amazing, after a week of riding it I haven't needed to recharge yet. Probably have put 10 miles of riding now. -Folding the bike takes a little effort, but otherwise pretty easy. Having the folding capability is one thing that sold me on this bike. It is solid and well built bike. A little on the heavy side, but that would be a little expected since it has a battery in it. Overall a great E-Bike. Would recommend to family and friends..
customer_reviews.author: pammy

customer_reviews.title: Great product ( will update again )
customer_reviews.text: Unfolding/folding is very easy setting up seat and handle bars is a breeze sharp turns are a bit of a challenge have only put in about 7 miles with off and on with slight hills and peddling not being hard To go up on so will give it a full charge and give it a go to test it's limits Update 12/17/19 Still running smoothly I'll usally just go to the outlet mall area that's about 3 miles away with a slightly long hill will peddle to help myself and the battery out vise versa and still have about a bit over half battery left so far so good will update a bit more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: alfred dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Bikes amazing, battery life is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: So I love this bike, not gonna lie...had it for a few months now, well built, easy to brake down, GREAT RIDE..but the mileage per charge is a joke!! Full disclosure..im 200lbs...so I expected the mileage to be cut maybe even in half...but I have been left stranded 3 times now at less then 3 miles. My biggest issue, the charge bar says I have 3 bars of power left every time so I dont even know the bike is about to die. Other then this, it's a great bike, but be honest about the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It's a blast, I will say the battery doesn't feel as fast anymore. It's difficult to clean since your not supposed to get it wet. The tire is small so it's easy to get a flat. Other than that it's added some serious quality to my life. I take it out daily helps me get out of the house and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Berad

customer_reviews.title: Aweeeesome! It passed the ultimate test
customer_reviews.text: Awesome E-bike. I tested it from Redondo pier to Rancho Palos Verdes... If you know SoCal, you know that is an insane number of hills and inclines. It made it and only used two bars of battery. I went back and forth between throttle and pedal assist to see what it felt like and how it performed. Major inclines did great with throttle... the pedal assist felt like I was on flat road it was so easy. Great price, great ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sinatra, Immortal Ink Publications

customer_reviews.title: Nice e-bike for the right-size person
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6'0, 230 lbs man and this bike is just too small for me (even when seat & handlebars adjusted, my knees still hit my arms and it's not a comfortable ride for any sort of distance, also pedals felt small). However, I gave it to my GF (5'2", 135 lbs) and she loves it. She even rode it to work 14.2 mi each way and the battery lasted with charge up while shes at work. So all in all it's a good bike if you're on the shorter side. Bought the rack for back and can place a bag on there to transport lock, charger, water etc.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Cali

customer_reviews.title: Must have !
customer_reviews.text: This little bike is fast... I bought it to ride it to the beach from my house. It goes up to 15mph full throttle You can pedal on electric and use both I really like it. It folds and I keep in the trunk. You can’t even see it. It folds 3 ways
customer_reviews.author: Albertdagreat

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bikes in June 2019. It’s been a little over a year and they still work just as great! We’ve went on biking trails with them. We even walk our dog with these bikes. The sound of the bike going fast really gets my pup going. He’s a malt-poo and this bikes goes about 15 mph. And he loves it! He runs just as fast with the bike. Impressive. We’ve tried electric scooters before but I def prefer these electric bikes over them. Haha maybe because I’m lazy. Idk. Pedaling without the electric isn’t so hard. I love it. It’s a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Kazoua Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Broken pedal on the third day!but Still a great value of money so far.
customer_reviews.text: Should be totally happy at this point,at the third day I bought it.It’s a great commuter because this bike’s ride experience exceeded my expectations the throttle acceleration is powerful,ride quality feels sturdy. But!there’s this but.Today I found one of the pedal is broken!Not on the third day!I know this pedal is not a particularly important part on a ebike and the pedal defect shouldn’t bother me too much since I don’t use pedal much.Nevertheless It did ruined a good buying experience.It makes me doubt the quality of other parts on it.
customer_reviews.author: oyaayoc

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life, mechanical issues appeared
customer_reviews.text: the battery life is short and can't be used for more than 10 miles for each charge and may be less if you use it on the hills. Abnormal sounds started to be heard as if something get broken inside , worst customer services ever, they don't care about customers
customer_reviews.author: A.1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome transportation.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bike yesterday. I had the smaller electric but it got stolen. I decided on getting the EB 5 and so far it's great. It's fast as hell and rides good. The only thing I don't like is there is no brake light or headlight. So I have to go and get something good for it. I am very impressed though. The only bad thing is that people are looking to steal these bikes. So I can only bring it to places that I can bring it inside. Today they have the battery operated grinders that these guys use to cut the locks. So be very careful where you lock yours up.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mays

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike but Not Safe - Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: E-Bike is easy to assemble and fold. It rides pretty good but the throttle keeps getting stuck so it keeps moving forward even when you’re not touching the throttle which makes it unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: I need to have knee replacement surgery and this bike makes riding bike painless!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It works well and is fun to ride. The seat is a bit uncomfortable but that is easily remedied with a gel seat cushion that you can put over the seat. I ride back and forth to work and it makes my commute enjoyable while giving me some exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ostrander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. I love it. It’s fast and I’ve been using to get to work (5 miles from house). The trick is never let it get to only 2 bars on the battery screen. It’ll die pretty soon. Until it gets to 2 bars you can ride it with no worries. As soon as the 3 or 2 bars hit you better start looking for somewhere to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Renato A.

customer_reviews.title: One might want to have it assembled by a professional.
customer_reviews.text: This was the third electric bike I bought. I had problems with assembling the seat. The instructions that came with it were useless to me. My brother came to my rescue. He didn't need any instructions and thought the instructions was lacking. It did ride well; however, until the next problem with the charger. I gave up on it and tossed it. I think I just got a lemon and might have had better luck with another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Nice!, quick commuter bike for the money. The small wheels take some getting used to. Power clicks on automatically. Because it has pedals can be used on sidewalk! I'd send a photo but all I have is my young girlfriend riding it naked. Seat is uncomfortably hard. Good idea to jump off the the cash for a padded seat cover!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Codi

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, perfect for our needs. Love them
customer_reviews.text: We have a small RV, wanted something we could fold up and put in compartment. 2 fit in our large side compartment. They can go up long steep hills, and are pretty quick. Seats are hard, but thats okay, since we dont plan on riding them for super long rides, just to go on small errands, or to bar / rest, or grocery run. Bought nice baskets that fit perfectly, and detach easily. Love them, at least at this point. Have only had for a week thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stone

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed with very low mileage
customer_reviews.text: Great compact ebike while while it worked. It sat more than anything. The bike has approximately 60 miles on it - I've had it for 11 months. tires are still new. The five bar charger will show 4-5 bars, then the bike dies (probably the battery failing). sometimes it will turn back on for a pedal assist. Bummed out because I really liked this bike.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Good idea , cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: I've been reading reviews and people have the same issue with the back tire going flat within the first week. I only weigh 165lbs and my back tire bust on the 5th day of use. I didnt pay $500 to take my bike to my local bike shop to fix something that should of came as advertised. The comments have people complaining about the design and still giving the bike 4 stars. Please be weary of that. I'm returning this bike after my second purchase and both times the tires went flat within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect commuter bike!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect commuter bike - I ride about 70 NYC blocks a day on this bad boy and it works perfect — no issues in the few months I’ve had it — saved me a lot of money not having to use the train. Only thing I dislike is the charger port location.
customer_reviews.author: J. Duverglas

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! - Service and Warranty is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! I bought two of those, and while I was quite happy when they worked, one of them died suddenly... Amazon does not handle Swagtron issues, so I had to ship it to Swagtron (my expense, despite the fact, that it was STILL UNDER WARRANTY). After 2 MONTHS of they receiving the bike, they emailed me that the throttle and the controller is broken, and it is NOT COVERED and I have to pay for both the service and parts. I am still trying to talk with them, but every response takes them a week +. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Jakub Tomaszewski

customer_reviews.title: I like my new bicycle.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my bicycle. I was not an avid rider since I hadn't been on a bike for a very long time. I practiced for awhile until I felt ready to go further than just across the street. My friend who is an excellent rider had me taking trips to Flushing Meadows Park, in Flushing Queens and Forest Park, in Forest Hills, Queens. I am very proud of myself. I have to admit that I do use the electric part of the bike more often that manually pedaling. The bike is perfect for the amount of riding I do weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Offen

customer_reviews.title: Non removable battery.
customer_reviews.text: Non-removable battery failed after fewer than a dozen recharges. Did not seem worth the cost of shipping entire bike back to factory and risk getting another dud battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I like everything but one thing,...The seat. It's murder on your A... I consider it an excellent bike, a pleasure to ride, just getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Al3158

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was buying a brand new swagtron eb5 this is not fair
customer_reviews.text: This is a bunch of BS I thought I was buying a brand new bike for the money that I spend on this bike it came looking like if somebody used it three months and then send it to me looks like they painted the bike that has a bunch of scratches everywhere the bike runs good and all but that's not fair I think I should have received the brand new bike not something used I thought when you buy from Amazon you're buying brand new I even clicked on the brand new item nothing used
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. She has had no issues and routinely drives around town. She appreciates it’s both electric and pedal power.
customer_reviews.author: Tanari

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived defective and the battery dangerously cuts off after a few minutes of riding. This is particularly dangerous in a bike line. Amazon customer service is helping me to get a replacement. Customer service chat was actually pretty easy to deal with, however I'm hoping the next delivery won't take as long, and that the next bike is not defective or dangerous to ride. We're already e-bike and e-scooter uses so we are very knowledgeable about riding these and this was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bike was worth every penny. I almost didn't buy because of the name "swagcycle".... but after looking up some youtube reviews I took a leap of faith. I am surprised with out awesome this bike is. I am enjoying it and would highly recommend this bike to anybody that would listen. I think I will buy some paint to get rid of that name though.....
customer_reviews.author: kirby

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy one
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy this.. We have a white one and black one. The black one we got second, and from the get go it was slower than the white one. Now when you push on the throttle it goes for about 1 second and then cuts off completely and you have to restart the bike, but the same problem happens. It’s un rideable. Just heard from the return department that I have to ship it back myself and they MIGHT fix it, or they might charge me for parts and labor. This bike was defective from the beginning and is only getting worse. So much for a 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Josh L

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy any more shipping from China all defective 👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an e-bike from amazon and I received it but I had some issues related to the order. First of all the package I got was damaged when I received it. Later when I checked the bike it had physical damage too. It is damaged at the joint of its body. Even the tire comes out when I pump it. So it's not as described in the picture. That's why I would like to request you to refund my money back and take your product back.
customer_reviews.author: Tseten Gonpo

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for fun, you found it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to buy an ebike for a couple of years and my husband gifted me one for Mothers Day! THEY ARE SO MUCH FUN! I am almost 40 and feel like a big kid again! To me, priceless. These are worth every penny and then some! If you have been thinking about it, stop thinking and hit the buy now button :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Seat hurts my balls
customer_reviews.text: It's a doodoo battery and the seat hurts my balls.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: If you want to smile for miles, Swagtron
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. It is my favorite present I bought myself. One day I was fishing with my son near a bike trail and he exclaimed, “Look Mom! I think that guy has the same bike as you.” I looked over and this guy’s full face was smiling and he was riding by on the Swagtron. I told my son, “You know it’s my bike because he’s so happy.” I did get a softer seat so the 14 mile commute to work is even more comfy now.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Bargain.
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a moped than an ebike. Because I'm 125# when I pedal the power kicks in with a vengeance so I have to be very careful. Basically I only pedal when going up hill. You absolutely cannot beat the price. For $499 it is an amazing and fun machine.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money and a lot of fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a few days ago. It was much easier to unpack and much sturdier than I assumed it would be. The bikes come assembled, charged and ready to go. I only recommend checking the tire pressure. Ours came a little low and it greatly affects the speed and battery life. I ordered two. We’ve been riding them every day. I had no idea I would enjoy them as much as I have. I highly recommend for an introductory e bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bike for a few weeks, and I have nothing bad to say about it. It's awesome! I have ridden it to work almost every day, and it makes my commute fun and exciting. When I'm riding it I never want to stoo
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this is 4 stars instead of 5 is because I wish Swagtron would have a "premium" version of this bike. I would definitely pay more for a bike that had a few more features to it (shock absorbers, multiple gears, etc.) Otherwise, this bike does everything it is supposed to do at an exceptional level with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little bike!!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this little bike and love it! I got it for my daughter's tenth birthday. It came charged so she was off and running. There was a small learning curve but in no time she was riding up and down our mountain drive and around the mountain roads. This thing is great on dirt. We liked it so much that we ordered a second one for me so we can ride together. I debated about ordering this bike for weeks and am so glad I did it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. White

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Don’t look any further!
customer_reviews.text: We got 4 of these for the whole family and they are AMAZING! Road uphill for 2.5 miles and back and only when down to 4 bars out of 5!!! Very impressed! They even outdid a bike $1000 more expensive! They did amazing for 220lbs all the way down to 50lbs! Our kids are 9 and 11 and they work great for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Carie Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Super useful for the everyday life
customer_reviews.text: I bought the e-bike less that a month ago and I use it everyday to go to work that is 11 miles far from my place. I have to take the charger with me if I do not want to pedal but it is not heavy and big. Super suggested if you are looking for a way to move into a city without spending so much money and avoid getting tired with normal bikes!!
customer_reviews.author: Giulia scarnecchia

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great look just minor problem
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 bike, loved it so much bought a 2nd one. They are a lot of fun to use, great price, great look, function well. Only problem is 2nd bike purchased battery runs out faster than 1st bike I bought only days before. Old battery maybe?
customer_reviews.author: J. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, but my battery is bad.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bike, I live 2 miles from my work and I’ve saved a ton of money ridding this instead of ubering. It’s pretty fast even tho I’m a bigger guy, 6ft, 210 pounds. The only problem is the battery life. I don’t know if I got a crappy battery but I have to charge after every ride, meaning once I get to work I have to charge it or it will die on the way home. Even then It does what I need it to do, I’m not a complainer. At the same time if someone can contact me on the battery issue I would def make this a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: John McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: My life is so much easier
customer_reviews.text: This bike is worth every penny, I can just sit on it and let it take me anywhere, it's wonderful. After I had issues with trying to get a car, this ended up being a funner, cheaper alternative.
customer_reviews.author: dakota boucher

customer_reviews.title: foldable bicycle
customer_reviews.text: It took a week for the bicycle, and the overall feeling was very good. It was very small. I watched a lot of electric bicycles on Amazon. I chose this one. The 250w motor gave me the power, and the power system. It is also very easy to ride a bicycle. The only bad thing is that there is no night light, but I still like to ride it to buy things.
customer_reviews.author: WU Lin

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine
customer_reviews.text: This little bike is just what I needed to get to the supermarket since I sold my truck. It seems to be very well made, and fun to ride. ---ridden it for a few days. I love this little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Gerundive

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use open and closing it is is under 10 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Great bicycle extremely lightweight I just wish they offered a type of string backpack or strap to carry it where there's no chance of it unfolding
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice ebike
customer_reviews.text: My friend have this bike it's awesome. I ordered one but cancel it because it takes forever to arrive from Newark California to San Jose California takes less than 30 minutes Amazon takes a week to hold it in their warehouse
customer_reviews.author: peacelink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. Was easy to assemble, and haven't had any issues. I've been using it for my side job as a bike courier, and for other things. Has plenty of durability and range, and is incredible for running errands, exercising my dogs, or just getting some exercise (Isn't too difficult to pedal with the power off/battery low). This is my first ebike, and has definitely been worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The better the charge the faster you go
customer_reviews.text: I use my bike for work as I'm only traveling 2-3 miles a day. Although I live in Florida and the rainy season made to adjust my schedule to leave for work earlier to beat the afternoon storms home. I also wish there was some type of rear wheel guard because if there is water on the road or sidewalk area the water runs right up your back.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Richards

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold and really heavy for petite girl!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is cute and run smoothly. I like it buttttt.... it’s NOT easy to fold at all! And it’s really heavy for me a 5foot small female carry just 5 steps up to my house. For the mileage, it’s very much 10miles only. Not more than that! And I live in the city, no hill! When I did like 6miles the green bar was still at 3 but it was running Super slow. I have to return and get the e-scooter then.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Fun compact commuter bike
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to write an easy to fold. Makes my commute so much quicker and easier. I get constant compliments on how cool it looks. Came completely assembled. Have been riding it for two months now and love my decision on buying this bike.
customer_reviews.author: turandot82

customer_reviews.title: Great, compact, foldable alternative to scooters
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to scooters. Much more comfort riding and has good enough power to push me at 240lbs. Wife loves this a d the folbaility allows us to take it with us on trips.
customer_reviews.author: KorianJoe

customer_reviews.title: The Commuter E-Bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike to commute to places within a 1-4 mile radius. Since owning the EB-5 I've been extremely satisfied with the performance. In both pedal assist and throttle mode I enjoy that the bike is easy to ride and a perfect size for a commuter e-bike. When you get the bike make sure to inspect bike for potential damage from shipping also pump up the tires before you ride for the first time... have fun
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fun E bike for around town
customer_reviews.text: Great little bike for cruising around town! Only issue with the bike was the saddle was very uncomfortable for the bike. But was an easy fix by swapping it out with a cruiser saddle. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PandaaG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! I use it to go to work. I’m shot (4,9 ft) so I needed a small bike not heavy. This one is just perfect. Battery last longtime and easy to fold. Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Notre Dame

customer_reviews.title: Great to take on a camping trip
customer_reviews.text: Love these bikes! We fold them and store them under our motorhome and use them for short commutes to the market or just zipping around the area. They are sturdy and we had our first ride this past weekend and loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia T. Forsberg

customer_reviews.title: It’s reliable 👌🏻👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this bike 👍🏻👌🏻 I recommend everybody should buy a bike Like this one 😊👍🏻, you love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios Cayavidis

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for commute
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bike for almost 3 months now and it is working great, I use it as my mode of transportation going to work 3 miles everyday.. I charge it every 3 days, it does not have a shock absorber like the mountain bikes, it would be great if it has a headlight but so far I love this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mart Mananghaya

customer_reviews.title: Great Commuter Bike
customer_reviews.text: I love the range. I commute 4 miles to campus, a little bit around campus, and 4 miles back home with charge to spare. This makes it super easy to get to my classes and to work as well as saving me money on having to buy a car. The assembly was easy and the folding/unfolding process is easy and natural. No complaints, easily worth the money I spent on it!
customer_reviews.author: luiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what. Need it for.
customer_reviews.text: Mainly used to get around backstage to and from my office. Holds charge well. Not sure about “mileage” but it lasts all day without me having to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Playtime

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Every thing looked good in my package only problem was the ringer by the handle bars was broken. The bike to me was expensive and I hoped to receive it in new condition. I'd appreciate I get sent a replacement please!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Capistran

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This is my first e-bike. I wasn't going to spend a bunch of money until I tried one out. I'm really impressed. I'm 265 pounds and this thing really works. I've only had it one day but I really love this so far. I'm 5 8 and 265 so I'm a big guy and I road it no problem. Both my 10 and 12 year old road it and loved it too. unless it breaks or something I would have to say this was 500 bucks well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Been happy with the bike, although I did have to adjust the brakes to get them working properly. They were way too soft before. Covered up the SWAGTRON logo with stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the bike for 3 days now, but I love this thing! I commute about 3 miles a day to the train, 3 miles back and go through tons of hills and this thing flies. The battery life is amazing, the only down side is the suspension makes you feel most of the bumps but that’s not much of a downer. All in all a great purchase/investment and worth every penny!! Highly recommended for NYC/Queens residents.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Very adaptable; gets good gas mileage off of battery.
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson to get back and forth to work. Got this one because you can change out the battery!
customer_reviews.author: AlleyOop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: My bike was under warranty, and my battery started to die due to water getting into that charge socket area. Contacted them, and shipped the bike to them. And they happily gave me a brand new one. Happy to do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Scheber Baron

customer_reviews.title: Worked for the first days then got worse
customer_reviews.text: They promised about a 15 mile range ride and it nearly goes 4 miles. The seat broke off as it was broken in the first place. The bike is just not good at all and the ride is not very enjoyable. I would suggest to spent a bit more and get a better bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept!  Defective product and even worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this bicycle 10 JUN 2020; the charger stopped working 26 JUN. When I contacted the seller for a replacement battery charger they responded: "Due to high demand, we are currently out of stock on this item. I’m so very sorry for the inconvenience. Please continue to visit the website for availability. Thank you and have a wonderful day." Defective product and even worse customer service!
customer_reviews.author: MI Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repair requested, sent, and waiting for 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great; it has a great motor assistance, it folds nicely, etc. However, I had a flat tire after 3 days so I sent it to the repair center. They approved the repair so fast so I thought the reapir would be done quickly too. 5 weeks past, and the company says these days they need more time due to reduced staff so it takes 3~4 weeks (which means they were already late). I now vaguely remember how it felt like when I rode that bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jaepil Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This bike is so much fun. My husband and I bought 2 of them several months ago and they are perfect for commuting to work or riding for fun. They easily fold and fit in the trunk of the car. Battery life has never been as issue.
customer_reviews.author: EAW

customer_reviews.title: Two problems
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying my first ever electric bike! The only problems i have is the back tire is hard to put air in. The seat is a bit rough but an easy fix is to switch it out. Besides those two I'm enjoying it.. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Antwone Wright

product_meta.title: SWAGTRON Swagcycle EB5 Series Aluminum Folding Ebike
feature_bullets: YOUR RIDE, YOUR RULES — Go full throttle up to 15 MPH on battery power alone. But the EB5 PLUS also rides like a traditional pedal-only bicycle. Need some extra oomph? Turn on the pedal-to-go for a boost of electric power as you pedal.

DESIGN THAT PERFORMS — Premium build. Eye-catching design. Streamlined and aerodynamic. But as good as it looks, the EB5 PLUS performs even better. Up to 15.5 miles on a single charge and conquer steep hills and 30-degree inclines with ease.

RIDING IN COMFORT — The height-adjustable seat and handlebar gives you complete control over the comfort level of your adventure. And the high-performance 14-inch air-filled tires deliver smooth, stable rides — even on uneven pavement.

EXTRA BATTERY = EXTRA MILEAGE— Grab an extra battery (sold separately) and swap out the old battery for longer adventures. The compact size makes it easy to charge the eBike battery pack at your desk at work without taking up a lot of space.

PRE-ASSEMBLED — EB5 PLUS is ready to go as soon as it’s delivered. No complicated assembly. In minutes, you’ll be ready to hop on, power up and ride Have questions? Contact our world-class customer support, backed by an American company.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
